Text: What is this BS obsession with MKV? Horrible format, can't watch them on any kind of media player. :(

@SimUser2 Lol, any player? Did you just try it on Windows Media Player and Quicktime and give up?  VLC player or KMP.  I think even GOM player can play it.  MKV is the way to go with HD video.
